title: Crew Sweatshirt by New Era
text: Great for wearing over a button-down or on its own. Details: -Sueded, 9 oz., 52% cotton/48% polyester French terry. -Crewneck with rib-knit V inset. -Rolled-forward shoulders. -Rib-knit cuffs, side panels and bottom hem. -Coverstitched seams. -Import. Screen Print. Black.
